title: launcher failed
body: i open lol then tells me that it server not respawining any help guys pls ? :D

replies.body:
When a "Server not responding" message pops up, it's typically an indication that your connection to the League servers is not stable. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to resolve this for good.

Let me know if those steps helped out.
